name: Albany Latin Festival
description: Celebrate Latin culture with live music, dance performances, and authentic food vendors featuring tacos and more.

name: Taco Tuesday Pop-Up at Toro Cantina
description: Savor a variety of tacos with unique fusion flavors at this beloved local spot.

name: Opening Celebration at Fusion Bistro
description: Grand opening of Fusion Bistro, offering a unique blend of Asian and Latin cuisines with special tasting menus.

name: Albany Taco Fest 2025
description: Celebrate the Capital Region's best tacos with local vendors, live music, and family-friendly activities. Featuring a variety of taco styles from traditional to fusion.

name: Toro Cantina Taco Night
description: Savor authentic Mexican tacos and margaritas at Toro Cantina, a local favorite for fresh flavors and vibrant atmosphere.

name: Albany Food & Wine Festival
description: Sample culinary delights and fine wines from local chefs and vineyards at this annual event celebrating the region's food scene.

name: Fusion Feast at Druthers Brewing Co.
description: A special menu night featuring unique fusion dishes like taco-inspired burgers paired with craft beers brewed on-site.

name: Albany Taco Fest
description: Celebrate the Capital Region's love for tacos with local vendors offering unique and traditional recipes, live music, and family-friendly activities.

name: Farm-to-Table Dinner at Toro Cantina
venue: Toro Cantina, 111 Wolf Rd, Albany, NY
description: A special dining event featuring locally sourced ingredients with a focus on modern Mexican dishes, including unique taco offerings.

name: Capital Region Food Truck Festival
description: A gathering of the area's best food trucks, featuring diverse cuisines including tacos, fusion dishes, and desserts, plus live entertainment.

name: Photography Exhibit: 'Capital Vistas'
venue: Albany Institute of History & Art, Albany, NY
description: A stunning collection of photographs capturing the beauty and history of the Capital Region, on display for a limited time.
